name: Ascension (Noah Schultz)
description:
Ascension Ascend through the 9 levels of hell to get back to family. Each level explores the themes of each of the 9 levels of Hell: Treachery, Fraud, Violence, Heresy, Anger, Greed, Gluttony, Lust, and Limbo. Each level provides a new puzzle or challenge, but the spirit of your parents are always with you, guiding you in your path towards the surface.

Created in 72 hours for Global Game Jam 2019.

Controls: A and D for Movement Space to Jump
